title: Lullabye
description: Alternate Cover Edition of Kindle ASIN B019C3VERI. It's time for the Kingston triplets to be born.I've heard stories of how women have their water break or go into labor in their home. That's not how it happened with Lucy and our babies. As long as Lucy and the babies are okay, I'll be okay--even if we are surrounded by the Russo Famiglia.But nothing has been normal for us from the day we met. So why would it start now?***BONUS: A Very Xander Christmas 2, Rockstar #6.5 ***This is not a standalone. Before reading Ballad, it's recommended to read: Falling Down (Rockstar #1) Blush (Rockstar #2) A Very Xander Christmas (Rockstar #2.5) Amplify (Rockstar #3) Interlude (Rockstar #4) Ballad (Rockstar #5)
author: Anne Mercier
